transbit.tbits.indexer
Class IndexUtil

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.indexer.IndexUtil

public class IndexUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is an utility class that has functionality related to basic operations over a lucene index.

Version:
: $Id: $
Author:
: Vaibhav.

                                 boolean bCreate)
                          throws java.io.IOException
This method checks the presence of a Lucene Index at the given location

Parameters:
aLocation - Location of index.
bCreate - Flag if the directory should be created if not present

java.io.IOException - Throws IOException on error.
